籤詩版本二:
Lapho imvula ende yasentwasahlobo iqala ukugqashuka, i-Jade Rabbit kanye neGolden Crow kuya ngokuya kugqama
Izinto ezindala ziyanyamalala bese kuvela izinto ezintsha. Bheka bese uhlangana nesango likadrako.
詩意:
Le hexagram iwuphawu lwemvula ende nokukhanya kwasekuseni.
Konke kuhamba njengoba bekuhleliwe.
解曰: Ivikelwe onkulunkulu namaBuddha. Ayikho ingozi yenhlekelele. Sengathi uhambo lube nokuthula. Buya nodumo ekugcineni.
籤詩故事一:
◇ UJiang Taigong uhlangana neNkosi uWen
Ubukhosi bakwaZhou. UJiang Shang, igama elihle likaZiya. Abantu bakwaJi (abasuka eXuzhou eMpumalanga China Sea). Igama lobuTao linguFei Xiong, futhi okhokho bakhe babekwa uphawu ngoLu (igama lendawo), ngakho ubizwa nangokuthi uLu Wang.
Ukuze agweme izikhathi ezinezinkinga zeNkosi uZhou Yobukhosi BamaShang, wayehlala ngasemanzini oLwandle LwaseShayina LwaseMpumalanga futhi edoba eMfuleni i-Weishui. Udobo luqondile.Inhloso yakhe akukhona ukudoba, kodwa ukuba undunankulu oqotho.
Inkosi uWen yaseZhou yezwa ukuthi ihlakaniphile futhi yamqasha njengothisha wayo (undunankulu). (Wayeneminyaka engamashumi ayisishiyagalombili ngaleso sikhathi) Kamuva, iNkosi uWu yaseZhou yahlasela iNkosi uZhou, yabhubhisa uBukhosi BamaShang, futhi yasungula uBukhosi bukaZhou. Inkosi uWu yambiza ngoShangfu. Indodana yakhe u-Ding Gong yanikezwa isicoco se-Marquis of Qi.
(Ingqikithi yale ndaba: U-Jiang Taigong, owayelinde ukudoba emfuleni i-Weishui isikhathi eside, ekugcineni waphuma enkingeni futhi waphinda wasetshenziswa iNkosi uWen.)
聖意: Endlini, uZhongping ngokwakhe uthandazela izibusiso nengcebo. Uma kungekho sivumelwano, umshado uyazenzekela. Abahamba ngezinyawo besifazane baseLiujia bavimba inkundla, izikelemu zivimba imfuyo eyisithupha, zivimba ukuseshwa kwalowo muntu, ukumangalelwa sekwephuzile nokufuduka, inhlanhla kulahleka impahla, izifo, namathuna e-Xingxing Mountain.
